item.description: We will be starting to plan a fashion event for the fall of 2012. Share your ideas about what will make a great event. If you are a designer or model and you may want to participate, we want to hear from you. We will also need music for the event-bands and singers are encouraged to attend. There will also be time for networking.
item.how_to_find_us: Email me (Evan) for my mobile phone number
item.name: Fashion Event Planning
